content.question:
The yields, in bushels per acre, of soybeans for <math alttext="25" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> randomly selected counties in the midwestern region of the country in <math alttext="2016" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2016</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> are summarized in the table.

<math alttext="n" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="x bar" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="25" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="45.88" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="7.94" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Assuming all conditions for inference are met, which of the following is a <math alttext="99 percent" overflow="scroll"> <mn>99</mn> </math> percent confidence interval for the population mean yield of soybeans for all counties in the midwestern region in <math alttext="2016" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2016</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="45.88 plus or minus, 2.797 times the fraction with numerator 7.94, and denominator 25" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>2.797</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="45.88 plus or minus, 2.797 times open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 7.94, and denominator 5, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>2.797</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="45.88 plus or minus, 2.576 times open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 7.94, and denominator 5, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>2.576</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="45.88 plus or minus, 2.787 times the square root of, the fraction with numerator 7.94, and denominator 25, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>2.787</mn><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="45.88 plus or minus, 2.797 times the square root of, the fraction with numerator 7.94, and denominator 25, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>2.797</mn><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="45.88 plus or minus, 2.797 times open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 7.94, and denominator 5, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45.88</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>2.797</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.94</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Mean

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
